title: Not receiving chests after wins even though I have no chat bans or restrictions??
body: Hello, It's been ages since I've gotten any type of Loot after winning games. I have no chat restrictions or any bans, why am I not receiving the chests I deserve? I need blue essences, but the game won't give me chests after wins. It's been several months. Can you please explain why this is happening?

replies.body: RealIronis has provided some solid information here.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide there are a few requirements, including owning the champion and not already receiving one from them.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Well, for starters you need at least S- grade on your champion and own that champion for a chance to win a chest.
Next, you can only get 1 chest per champion you own per season.
Now the season has restarted, you should be able to get a new chest for every champion you own, provided you win and get a minimum mastery-grade of S-.
